verses.verse: <S%H5650>"Behold,<s%> my servant, whom I <S%H8551>uphold;<s%> my <S%H972>chosen,<s%> in whom my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H7521>delights<s%>â€” I have <S%H5414>put<s%> my <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> on <S%H3318>him.<s%> He will bring <S%H4941>justice<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
He will not <S%H6817>shout,<s%> nor <S%H5375>raise<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> nor cause it to be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in the <S%H2351>street.<s%>

He <S%H7665>won't<s%> break a <S%H7533>bruised<s%> <S%H7070>reed.<s%> He <S%H3518>won't<s%> quench a <S%H3544>dimly<s%> burning <S%H6594>wick.<s%> He will <S%H571>faithfully<s%> <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H4941>justice.<s%>

He will not <S%H3543>fail<s%> nor be <S%H7533>discouraged,<s%> until he has <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and the <S%H339>islands<s%> will <S%H3176>wait<s%> for his <S%H8451>law.<s%>"

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> he who <S%H1254>created<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and stretched them <S%H5186>out,<s%> he who spread <S%H7554>out<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> and that which comes <S%H6631>out<s%> of <S%H5414>it,<s%> he who gives <S%H5397>breath<s%> to its <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H7307>spirit<s%> to those who walk in <S%H1980>it.<s%>

<S%H3068>"I,<s%> Yahweh, have <S%H7121>called<s%> you in <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and will <S%H2388>hold<s%> your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and will <S%H5341>keep<s%> <S%H5414>you,<s%> and make you a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> for the <S%H5971>people,<s%> as a <S%H216>light<s%> for the <S%H1471>nations;<s%>

to <S%H6491>open<s%> the <S%H5787>blind<s%> <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> to bring the <S%H616>prisoners<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4525>dungeon,<s%> and those who <S%H3427>sit<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness<s%> out of <S%H1004>the<s%> <S%H3608>prison.<s%>
"I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> That is my <S%H8034>name.<s%> I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> my <S%H3519>glory<s%> to <S%H312>another,<s%> nor my <S%H8416>praise<s%> to engraved <S%H6456>images.<s%>
<S%H7223>Behold,<s%> the former things have <S%H935>happened,<s%> and I <S%H5046>declare<s%> new <S%H2319>things.<s%> I <S%H8085>tell<s%> you about them before they come <S%H6779>up.<s%>"

<S%H7891>Sing<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song,<s%> and his <S%H8416>praise<s%> from the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> you who go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and all that is <S%H4393>therein,<s%> the <S%H339>islands<s%> and their <S%H3427>inhabitants.<s%>

Let the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and its <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H5375>raise<s%> their <S%H2691>voices,<s%> with the villages that <S%H6938>Kedar<s%> <S%H3427>inhabits.<s%> Let the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5553>Sela<s%> <S%H7442>sing.<s%> Let them <S%H6681>shout<s%> from the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains!<s%>
Let them <S%H7760>give<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H5046>declare<s%> his <S%H8416>praise<s%> in the <S%H339>islands.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will go <S%H3318>out<s%> like a mighty <S%H1368>man.<s%> He will stir <S%H5782>up<s%> <S%H7068>zeal<s%> like a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war.<s%> He will raise a war <S%H7321>cry.<s%> <S%H6873>Yes,<s%> he will shout aloud. He will <S%H1396>triumph<s%> over his <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

"I have been <S%H2814>silent<s%> a long <S%H5769>time.<s%> I have been <S%H2790>quiet<s%> and <S%H662>restrained<s%> <S%H6463>myself.<s%> Now I will cry out like a travailing <S%H3205>woman.<s%> I will <S%H3162>both<s%> <S%H5395>gasp<s%> and <S%H7602>pant.<s%>

I will <S%H2717>destroy<s%> <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and <S%H1389>hills,<s%> and dry <S%H3001>up<s%> all their <S%H6212>herbs.<s%> I will <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> <S%H339>islands,<s%> and will dry <S%H3001>up<s%> the <S%H98>pools.<s%>

I will <S%H3212>bring<s%> the <S%H5787>blind<s%> by a <S%H1870>way<s%> that they <S%H3045>don't<s%> know. I will <S%H1869>lead<s%> them in <S%H5410>paths<s%> that they <S%H3045>don't<s%> know. I will <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H4285>darkness<s%> <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4625>them,<s%> and crooked places <S%H4334>straight.<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> these <S%H1697>things,<s%> and I will not forsake <S%H5800>them.<s%>

"Those who <S%H982>trust<s%> in engraved <S%H6459>images,<s%> who <S%H559>tell<s%> molten <S%H6459>images,<s%> <S%H430><s%> 'You are our gods' will be <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>back.<s%> They will be <S%H1322>utterly<s%> <S%H954>disappointed.<s%>
<S%H8085>"Hear,<s%> you <S%H2795>deaf,<s%> and <S%H5027>look,<s%> you <S%H5787>blind,<s%> that you may <S%H7200>see.<s%>

Who is <S%H5787>blind,<s%> but my <S%H5650>servant?<s%> Or who is as <S%H2795>deaf<s%> as my <S%H4397>messenger<s%> whom I <S%H7971>send?<s%> Who is as <S%H5787>blind<s%> as he who is at <S%H7999>peace,<s%> and as <S%H5787>blind<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H5650>servant?<s%>
You <S%H7200>see<s%> many <S%H7227>things,<s%> but <S%H8104>don't<s%> observe. His <S%H241>ears<s%> are <S%H6491>open,<s%> but he <S%H8085>doesn't<s%> listen.
It <S%H2654>pleased<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for his <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>' <S%H1431>sake,<s%> to magnify the <S%H8451>law,<s%> and make it <S%H142>honorable.<s%>

But this is a <S%H962>robbed<s%> and <S%H8154>plundered<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%> All of them are <S%H6351>snared<s%> in <S%H2352>holes,<s%> and they are <S%H2244>hidden<s%> in <S%H3608>prisons.<s%> <S%H1004><s%> They have become a <S%H957>prey,<s%> and no one <S%H5337>delivers;<s%> and a <S%H4933>spoil,<s%> and no one <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H7725><s%> 'Restore them!'
Who is there among you who will give <S%H238>ear<s%> to <S%H7181>this?<s%> Who will listen and <S%H8085>hear<s%> for the time to <S%H268>come?<s%>

Who <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> as <S%H4933>plunder,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to the <S%H962>robbers?<s%> <S%H3068>Didn't<s%> Yahweh, he against <S%H2098>whom<s%> we have <S%H2398>sinned?<s%> For they <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H1980>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and they <S%H8085>disobeyed<s%> his <S%H8451>law.<s%>

Therefore he <S%H8210>poured<s%> the <S%H2534>fierceness<s%> of his <S%H639>anger<s%> on <S%H5807>him,<s%> and the strength of <S%H4421>battle;<s%> and it set him on <S%H3857>fire<s%> all <S%H5439>around,<s%> but he <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know; and it <S%H1197>burned<s%> <S%H7760>him,<s%> but he didn't take it to <S%H3820>heart.<s%>"
